# Dable

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-embed
  width="500"
  height="200"
  type="dable"
  data-widget-id="jobgqR7W"
  data-item-id="testitem"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://admin.dable.io.

### Required parameters

-   `data-widget-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-item-id`
-   `data-service-name`
